en: Narrator: Peppa and George are playing hide and seek.
cn: 旁白：佩奇和乔治在玩捉迷藏。

en: Narrator: It is George's turn to hide.
cn: 旁白：轮到乔治藏起来了。

sentence.en: It is George's turn to hide.

examples.en: It is Peppa's turn to eat ice cream.
It is Daddy Pig's turn to cook dinner.

en: Narrator: He must quickly find somewhere to hide before Peppa finishes counting.
cn: 旁白：他必须在佩奇数完之前赶快找个地方藏起来。

examples.en: find somewhere to play
find somewhere to eat

en: Peppa Pig: One... two... three... four... five... six... seven...
Narrator: George has found somewhere to hide.
cn: 旁白：乔治找到藏身的地方了。

en: Peppa Pig: Eight...
cn: 佩奇：八……

en: Narrator: Just in time.
cn: 旁白：正好赶上。

en: Peppa Pig: Nine... ten... Ready or not.
cn: 佩奇：九……十……不管你准备好了没有。

en: Peppa Pig: Here I come.
cn: 佩奇：我要来了。

en: Narrator: Peppa has to find where George is hiding.
cn: 旁白：佩奇要找出乔治藏在哪里。

sentence.en: Peppa has to find where George is hiding.
sentence.cn: 佩奇要找出乔治藏在哪里。

examples.en: Peppa has to find where Daddy Pig is hiding.
examples.cn: 佩奇要找出猪爸爸藏在哪里。

examples.en: Peppa has to find where Mummy Pig is hiding.
examples.cn: 佩奇要找出猪妈妈藏在哪里。

en: Peppa Pig: Found you.
cn: 佩奇：找到你了。

en: George: Oh.
cn: 乔治：哦。

en: Narrator: Peppa has found George.
cn: 旁白：佩奇找到了乔治。

en: Peppa Pig: George, I could see you too easily.
cn: 佩奇：乔治，我太容易看到你了。

en: Narrator: Now it is Peppa's turn to hide.
cn: 旁白：现在轮到佩奇藏起来了。

en: George: One... um... three.
cn: 乔治：一……呃……三。

en: Mummy Pig: I'll help George to count.
cn: 猪妈妈：我来帮乔治数数。

examples.en: I'll help Peppa to find her toy.
examples.cn: 我来帮佩奇找她的玩具。

examples.en: I'll help Daddy Pig to cook dinner.

en: Mummy Pig: One... two... three... four... five... six... seven... eight... nine... ten.
Mummy Pig: Okay, George, open your eyes.
cn: 猪妈妈：好了，乔治，睁开眼睛吧。

en: Narrator: George has to find where Peppa is hiding.
cn: 旁白：乔治要找出佩奇藏在哪里。

en: George: Oh.
cn: 乔治：哦。

en: Narrator: Peppa isn't hiding under the table.
cn: 旁白：佩奇没有藏在桌子底下。

en: Daddy Pig: George, have you thought of looking upstairs?
cn: 猪爸爸：乔治，你想过去楼上找找吗？

sentence.en: have you thought of looking upstairs?

examples.en: have you thought of going to the park?
have you thought of playing with your friends?

en: Narrator: Peppa isn't under the bed.
cn: 旁白：佩奇没有在床底下。

en: Narrator: What was that strange noise?
cn: 旁白：那是什么奇怪的声音？

en: Narrator: Peppa isn't behind the curtain.
cn: 旁白：佩奇没有在窗帘后面。

en: Narrator: There is that strange noise again.
cn: 旁白：又有那个奇怪的声音了。

en: Narrator: What can it be?
cn: 旁白：那会是什么呢？

en: Peppa Pig: Whee!
cn: 佩奇：咻——！

en: Narrator: George has found where Peppa was hiding.
cn: 旁白：乔治找到了佩奇藏的地方。

en: Peppa Pig: George found me.
cn: 佩奇：乔治找到我了。

en: Peppa Pig: Now it's Daddy's turn to hide.
cn: 佩奇：现在轮到爸爸藏了。

en: Daddy Pig: Oh, I think George should have another turn.
cn: 猪爸爸：哦，我觉得乔治应该再来一次。

en: Peppa Pig: But George isn't very good at hiding.
cn: 佩奇：可是乔治不太会藏。

sentence.en: George isn't very good at hiding.

examples.en: Peppa isn't very good at counting.
Daddy Pig isn't very good at cooking.

en: Daddy Pig: I'm sure he'll be better this time.
cn: 猪爸爸：我相信这次他会更好。

examples.en: he'll be better at playing football this time
he'll be better at drawing this time

en: Daddy Pig: Close your eyes and start counting.
cn: 猪爸爸：闭上眼睛开始数数吧。

en: Peppa Pig: One... two... three...
cn: 佩奇：一……二……三……

en: Narrator: Oh, dear.
cn: 旁白：哎呀。

en: Narrator: Peppa will easily find George.
cn: 旁白：佩奇很容易就能找到乔治。

en: Peppa Pig: Four... five... six...
cn: 佩奇：四……五……六……

en: Daddy Pig: George! Come over here...
cn: 猪爸爸：乔治！快到这边来……

en: Peppa Pig: Seven... eight... nine... ten.
cn: 佩奇：七……八……九……十。

en: Peppa Pig: Ready or not, here I come.
cn: 佩奇：不管你准备好了没有，我要来了。

en: Peppa Pig: Oh, George isn't hiding under the table.
cn: 佩奇：哦，乔治没有藏在桌子底下。

en: Peppa Pig: But George always hides under the table.
cn: 佩奇：可是乔治总是藏在桌子底下。

en: Daddy Pig: Have you thought of looking upstairs?
cn: 猪爸爸：你想过去楼上找找吗？

en: Peppa Pig: I know where he is.
cn: 佩奇：我知道他在哪里。

en: Peppa Pig: George is in the toy basket.
cn: 佩奇：乔治在玩具篮里。

en: Peppa Pig: Oh.
cn: 佩奇：哦。

en: Narrator: George is not in the toy basket.
cn: 旁白：乔治不在玩具篮里。

en: Narrator: Where can he be?
cn: 旁白：他会在哪里呢？

examples.en: Where can Daddy Pig be?
Where can Mummy Pig be?

en: Narrator: Peppa cannot find George anywhere.
cn: 旁白：佩奇哪儿都找不到乔治。

en: Peppa Pig: Daddy, I can't find George anywhere.
cn: 佩奇：爸爸，我哪儿都找不到乔治。

en: Daddy Pig: Oh, dear, I wonder where he can be.
cn: 猪爸爸：哎呀，我想知道他会在哪里。

sentence.en: I wonder where he can be.

examples.en: I wonder where my dog can be.
examples.cn: 我想知道我的狗会在哪里。

examples.en: I wonder where his sister can be.
examples.cn: 我想知道他的妹妹会在哪里。

en: Daddy Pig: Actually, I think there's something about George in this newspaper.
cn: 猪爸爸：其实，我觉得这份报纸上有乔治的消息。

sentence.en: there's something about George in this newspaper
sentence.cn: 这份报纸上有乔治的消息

examples.en: there's something about Peppa in this book
examples.cn: 这本书上有佩奇的消息

examples.en: there's something about Daddy Pig in this magazine
examples.cn: 这本杂志上有猪爸爸的消息

en: George: Whee...
cn: 乔治：咻——。

en: Peppa Pig: George. Found you.
cn: 佩奇：乔治，找到你了。

en: Mummy Pig: Oh, George. That was a good place to hide.
cn: 猪妈妈：哦，乔治。那个藏身的地方真不错。

sentence.en: That was a good place to hide.
sentence.cn: 那个藏身的地方真不错。

examples.en: That was a good place to play.
examples.cn: 那个玩耍的地方真不错。

examples.en: That was a good place to eat.
examples.cn: 那个吃饭的地方真不错。

en: Narrator: George was hiding behind Daddy Pig's newspaper all the time.
cn: 旁白：原来乔治一直藏在猪爸爸的报纸后面。

points.cn: 藏在猪爸爸的报纸后面
